plot: An asian girl is held prisoner against her own will on a yacht. Little does she know there is a bomb under her. 007 mission is to find the girl and defuse the bomb.
title: What Makes Me Tick!
plot_es: An asian girl is held prisoner against her own will on a yacht. Little does she know there is a bomb under her. 007 mission is to find the girl and defuse the bomb.
plot_en: An asian girl is held prisoner against her own will on a yacht. Little does she know there is a bomb under her. 007 mission is to find the girl and defuse the bomb.
